messages.title: Strong and Stable Leadership in the National Interest

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Strengthen Britain’s Hand in the Brexit Negotiations
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only the Conservatives have the proven leadership and the plan to deliver on Brexit and create a truly global, outward-looking Britain that works for everyone, not just the privileged few. Every vote for the Conservatives will strengthen Theresa May’s position in the negotiations.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Stronger Economy Where Everyone Plays by the Same Rules
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives have reduced the deficit by more than half and we must seize on the opportunities offered by Brexit. Labour want to borrow more and put the economy at risk. Only the Conservatives can offer the economic strength and stability that Britain needs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Principled Local Candidate with a Strong Record of Action
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Michael has continuously championed Northampton’s priorities in the House of Commons, notably winning over £3m for pothole repairs in our area. Since being elected in 2010 he has also refused to claim for any travel or food significantly underspent on his staffing and office costs, saving the taxpayer over £250,000.
